fr.pcreations.labs.RESTDroid.core

Interface ResourceRepresentation<ID>

  • Type Parameters:
    ID - The type of the id field of the item
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface ResourceRepresentation<ID>
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface which represents application items that have to be synchronized with the server
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Pierre Criulanscy
